#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
      int tc;
      scanf("%d", &tc);
      while(tc--)
      {
           int a,b,c,d;
           scanf("%d %d %d %d", &a, &b, &c, &d);
           if((a*b)%(c*d) == 0)
                printf("yes\n");
           else
               printf("no\n");
      }
      return 0;
}
